system.description:
At 1st level you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.bpkked98u8mb2q3w]{Chill Touch} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.omvngnmoo75is54f]{Spare the Dying} cantrips if you do not know them already. You may cast spare the dying as a bonus action with a range of 30 feet. In addition, when you cast spare the dying you may instead choose to heal the target for 1 hit point. You may do so a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier and regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

In addition, the Funeral and Guide the Passing effects of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.bq5bki8n1gfhrqz1]{Ceremony} spell as well as the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.724qyfqw7qcpe1ol]{Gentle Repose} spell last twice as long as normal, and the Funeral option lasts indefinitely against undead of CR 1 or lower.
